category: Radio: Intense Studies - Late Nights with Lin
word: Bonjour, je m'appelle Paul, j’apprends le français tous les jours.
meaning: Hello, my name is Paul, I learn French every day.

category: Radio: Intense Studies - Late Nights with Lin
word: Le français est parfois difficile pour moi.
meaning: French is sometimes difficult for me.

category: Radio: Intense Studies - Late Nights with Lin
word: Je suis dans la salle de classe chaque jour.
meaning: I am in the classroom every day.

category: Radio: Intense Studies - Late Nights with Lin
word: Nous apprenons beaucoup avec notre professeur.
meaning: We are learning a lot with our teacher.

category: Radio: Intense Studies - Late Nights with Lin
word: Les élèves comprennent les leçons plus lentement.
meaning: The students understand the lessons more slowly.

category: Radio: Classroom Disinterest - Lily and Strangers
word: Bonjour. Je m'appelle Léo. Je suis un élève.
meaning: Hello. My name is Léo. I am a student.

category: Radio: Classroom Disinterest - Lily and Strangers
word: Les élèves sont dans la salle de classe aujourd'hui.
meaning: The students are in the classroom today.

category: Radio: Classroom Disinterest - Lily and Strangers
word: Les leçons de français sont parfois difficile.

category: Radio: Classroom Disinterest - Lily and Strangers
meaning: I want to understand this lesson.

category: Radio: Classroom Disinterest - Lily and Strangers
Radio: Learning Preferences - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Salut Lisa. Aujourd'hui j'ai un examen de français.
meaning: Hi Lisa. Today I have a French exam.

category: Radio: Learning Preferences - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oh c'est intéressant. Est-ce que tu comprends tout?
meaning: Oh, that's interesting. Do you understand everything?

category: Radio: Learning Preferences - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Parfois je ne comprends pas le professeur.
meaning: Sometimes I do not understand the teacher.

category: Radio: Learning Preferences - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
Radio: Learning Preferences - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oui, je dois prendre des cours d'anglais aussi.
meaning: Yes, I also need to take English classes.

category: Radio: Learning Preferences - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Peut-être que le français est plus facile pour toi.
meaning: Maybe French is easier for you.
